skill.name: smc-harness
skill.description:
SMC trading agent skill for Alpha Harness backtesting. Provides ICT/SMC methodology,
decision frameworks, and behavioral guidelines for autonomous trading in simulated
environments. USE WHEN agent wakes in harness, needs to analyze markets, decide on
setups, or place orders.
skill.summary:
SMC trading agent skill for Alpha Harness backtesting. Provides ICT/SMC methodology,
decision framew...
skill.author: AaronAbuUsama

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based documentation skill with no executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or environment variable access. Contains only markdown documentation for trading methodology.

content.user_title: Apply SMC trading methodology to BTC/USDT analysis
content.value_statement: This skill provides a complete ICT/SMC trading framework for autonomous agents operating in backtesting simulations. It enables systematic market analysis, trade decision-making, and risk management following institutional trading principles.
actual_capabilities: Analyze multi-timeframe market structure (4H bias, 15m entry signals)
Identify liquidity pools, order blocks, and fair value gaps
Evaluate trade setups with structured decision framework (TRADE/WATCH/NOTE)
Calculate position sizes with 2% risk management rules
Record trade reasoning and market observations for audit
Set price alarms for monitoring key levels during simulation
limitations: Operates only in Alpha Harness backtesting environment
Uses only closed candles (no real-time data)
Requires setup creation before placing orders

use_cases.title: Backtesting framework
use_cases.description: Deploy autonomous trading agents that follow consistent methodology in simulated markets

use_cases.title: Methodology documentation
use_cases.description: Reference comprehensive ICT/SMC concepts and terminology for training purposes

use_cases.title: Trade simulation
use_cases.description: Test systematic trading decisions against historical BTC/USDT price data

prompt_templates.title: Record setup
prompt_templates.prompt: create-setup --symbol BTC/USDT --type choch-fvg --decision TRADE --confidence HIGH --reasoning [your analysis]

output: Key Liquidity: SSL at 95500 (swept), BSL at 98500 (unswept)

best_practices: Always start analysis with my-state to check active orders first
Require 2:1 minimum risk-to-reward before placing any trade
Wait for liquidity sweep and ChoCH confirmation before entering
anti_patterns: Trading against HTF bias without strong confirmation
Entering without waiting for liquidity sweep
Placing orders without creating a setup with documented reasoning

faq.question: What timeframes does this skill use?
faq.answer: 4H for bias determination and 15m for entry timing.

faq.question: What is the maximum risk per trade?
faq.answer: The harness enforces a maximum 2% risk per trade based on account balance.

faq.question: Can I trade other symbols besides BTC/USDT?
faq.answer: No, this skill is designed exclusively for BTC/USDT trading.

faq.question: Does this skill execute real trades?
faq.answer: No, it operates within Alpha Harness backtesting simulation only.

faq.question: Why is only closed candle data used?
faq.answer: Closed candles ensure no future information leak during backtesting accuracy.

faq.question: How does this compare to discretionary trading?
faq.answer: It provides systematic rules for consistent decision-making across sessions.
